slides.title: The Employee You Couldn't Afford

content.headline: What If You Had an Employee Who...
content.punchline: That employee exists now. It's AI.
content.visual: Friendly AI assistant helping business owner

slides.narration: What if you had an employee who worked twenty-four seven without breaks? Who answered every inquiry within seconds? Who never forgot a follow-up? Who handled all the repetitive tasks flawlessly? And who cost you almost nothing? That employee exists now. It's called AI. And it's no longer just for big corporations. Let me show you.

slides.title: The Small Business AI Gap

content.headline: Big Companies Have Been Using AI for Years
content.problem: Small businesses couldn't afford AI. Until now.
content.shift: The same technology is now accessible to everyone.

slides.narration: Big companies have been using AI for years. Amazon's personalized recommendations? AI. Netflix suggesting what to watch? AI. Banks catching fraud? AI. Airlines pricing flights? AI. Small businesses couldn't afford this technology. It required massive budgets, technical teams, custom development. Until now. The same technology that powers billion-dollar companies is now accessible to you.

slides.title: What AI Can Do For You

content.headline: Your AI Employee Can Handle:

capabilities.detail: Answer questions 24/7, route complex ones to you
Write posts, emails, descriptions in your voice
Never let a lead go cold

content.key_point: AI handles the volume. You handle the relationships.

slides.narration: What can your AI employee actually do? Customer inquiries—answer questions twenty-four seven, route the complex ones to you. Content creation—write posts, emails, descriptions that sound like you. Scheduling—book appointments and send reminders automatically. Follow-ups—never let a lead go cold again. Data entry—update records and sync platforms without you touching it. Social media—schedule posts and respond to comments. AI handles the volume. You handle the relationships.

slides.title: AI + Human = Superpower

content.headline: You're Not Being Replaced. You're Being Amplified.
content.visual: Human and AI as collaborative partners

slides.narration: Let me be clear: you're not being replaced. You're being amplified. AI brings speed, consistency, volume, availability, perfect memory. You bring judgment, creativity, real relationships, complex decision-making, genuine care. Together, you're ten times what either could be alone. The business owner who resists AI will be outcompeted. The one who partners with AI becomes unstoppable.

slides.title: The Math
slides.narration: Let's do the math. Answering routine inquiries—five hours a week saved, two hundred dollars in value. Writing content—three hours, a hundred twenty dollars. Scheduling and follow-ups—two hours, eighty dollars. Data entry and admin—two hours, eighty dollars. Total: twelve hours a week saved. Four hundred eighty dollars in value. That's twenty-five thousand dollars a year. For a fraction of the cost of one employee.

slides.title: The Owner Who Finally Took a Vacation

case_study.problem: Couldn't step away—everything depended on him

slides.narration: Real story. Landscaping company owner. Worked seventy hours a week. Couldn't step away because everything depended on him. He implemented AI: handling initial inquiries, scheduling estimates, sending follow-ups, creating social content. Result: seventy hours down to forty-five. Revenue up fifteen percent because he had capacity for more jobs. And this year? He took his first real vacation in eight years. His AI employee kept things running while he was gone.
